content: I think I'll start by researching online marketplaces and forums to get a rough estimate of my comic book collection's value. I'll also check out some price guides and see if I can find any similar comics that have sold recently. If I'm still unsure, I might consider consulting with a professional appraiser who specializes in comic books. Do you think I should also consider getting my Funko POP! figures appraised? I have a limited edition Game of Thrones Night King figure that I'm not sure about the value of.
